name: Delivery Harmony – low flat delivery
author: developer – sauce

sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin into your WordPress project
  2. Go to website control panel
  3. Go to the “plugins” webpage
  4. Activate the plugin “Delivery harmony”
  5. Configure the plugin using Onboarding flow

1.0

*Release Date – Augest 2020

1.1.0

*Update plugin name

1.2.0

*Add delivery date selector

1.3.0

*Added two options for immediate delivery

1.3.1

*Fixed styling for radio inputs on delivery time

1.4.0

*Added support for errors coming from API in order creation
sections.description:
Delivery Harmony – Book a DoorDash, Uber and Postmates couriers

Book a courier to deliver your goods locally on demand, same day or next day!
Delivery harmony helps you to extend your reach and start deliver to your customers within a minute.
Delivery harmony plugin connects your store into a smart dashboard that helps you manage all aspects of your store’s orders.
With delivery harmony you will be able to deliver your goods and extend your store reach up to 5 miles with low flat fee.

  • Get all order information, any time.
  • View online courier location, ETA’s and order status.
  • Commission free! You can also charge your customers for part all the delivery fee.
  • Registration is Short and Simple!

Advantages:

  • Extend Your Delivery Range – connect with your delivery range and reach new customers.
  • Commission free- Pay less with a low flat-fee delivery.
  • Multiple delivery service – connect multiple different couriers into one powerful network.
  • Premium Delivery Support- Avoid waiting 25 minutes on the phone — we’ll represent you.
  • Real-Time Flexibility- Use your in-house deliverers in tandem with ours, or switch back and forth between the two.
  • Tracking Options- Use a real-time moving map so you and your customers can track deliveries.

Delivery Harmony Plugin uses sauce’s delivery courier network and its dispatch Algorithm. Any time a user will make an order on a site, we will search or an available courier to deliver the order, using getsauce’s couriers network.

Privacy Policy https://www.getsauce.com/privacy-policy
